#summary Describes the exact subset of kml that vishis uses

= KML =
KML is a pretty large markup language and much of it does not apply to Visualize History.  So the VisHis site will parse KML files, but will ignore things irrelevant to its display of history.

This page will get more concrete once I find some good examples of how people use KML and I implement those
